data.description:
SKYBOX is an ultimate local VR media player which plays anything easily for all headsets and loved by VR users since 2016. 

**Play anything
SKYBOX supports a variety of video formats, including AV1, MP4, MKV, MOV, TS, WEBM, and many others. You can enjoy normal 2D contents, 3D contents in Side-by-Side and Top-Bottom format, VR180°, 360°, 200° , 220° contents in SKYBOX. 

**Save your Storage!
With SKYBOX, enjoy videos from your UPnP/DLNA media server or SMB share in the same Wi-Fi. An easy-to-set-up PC Client is available for free download on www.SKYBOX.xyz to support streaming from PC.

**Save your Time! 
No need to manually set the stereo mode such as 180° or 3D side-by-side; SKYBOX would automatically recognize video stereo mode ( 180° /200°/ 360° / 2D / 3D ) for you.

Features include: 
-Supports playing high resolution and HDR videos
-Supports playing pictures
-Supports USB devices
-Supports external subtitles(with stylings and animated effects) and custom thumbnails
-Supports audio/subtitle track synchronization
-Automatically recognizes the 3D/VR format of videos
-Support hand tracking, and head tracking(Lock Screen)
-Offers great immersive VR environments
-Advanced settings: curved screen, aspect ratio, color toning, variable-speed playback, shuffle & repeat videos

Any Feedback is highly appreciated: 
Bug Report to contact@skybox.xyz 
Discussions: https://forum.skybox.xyz 
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/SKYBOXVR/
FAQ: https://skybox.xyz/support/

Relax and enjoy SKYBOX :)

changelog.change_log:
[Feature] Added IMAX theater environment
[Feature] Supported viewing files on USB flash drives 
[Optimization] Supported adjusting image display time [Optimization] Added Anti-Aliasing and sharpness option [Optimization] Optimized Pro-HD Quality feature 
[Bug Fixes] Fixed the playback problem when using certain Bluetooth earphones

* Added multi-language keyboard
* Supported deleting files over SMB
* Supported .MPO, .WEBP and .JPS image format
* Supported auto-detecting Full SBS format using file name
* Supported adding Network & YouTube videos to Favorites
* Supported casting videos to headset
* Fix some bugs

[Bug Fix] Wrong texture format with Pro-HD function
[Bug Fix] Secondary account stuck at loading screen
fix airscreen channel files not displayed

Quest v1.1.4
- Supported Passthrough function
- Supported image format
- Supported 190° fisheye format
- Turn on/off network viewing history
- Optimized controllers & hand tracking function
- Optimized dynamic lighting
Bug fix: 进入空文件夹返回上一级不记住浏览位置；截图逻辑
Bug Fixed: Can't connect to Emby Server
